messages.messageBody:
I live in Madison, WI though I'll be moving to Dodgeville next year. I have
a 3 year old that I plan to homeschool. I attended the 2010 conference and
it was great...not sure who you can contact though :(

Ally

messages.subject: U.S.A. members: anyone else from Madison, WI area?
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks to months of research, & great resources online (such as this group, FB groups, & Laurette Lynn, The Unplugged Mom), we are leaving our public virtual
messages.messageBody:
Thanks to months of research, & great resources online (such as this group, FB groups, & Laurette Lynn, The Unplugged Mom), we are leaving our public virtual charter school (of 2yrs) in favor of unschooling. Prior to that experience, my now 11-yr-old daughter attended brick & mortar public school. Is there anyone on here from the Madison, WI area?

I found a website for an unschooling conference held here in 2010 & one planned for 2012 (& information on it's facilitators who live here), but the "contact us" link has errors.

Thank you for YOU!
Jo Anna
